# Railway Environment Variables
# Copy each value to Railway's Variables section

# ============================================
# FIREBASE SERVICE ACCOUNT (Base64 encoded)
# ============================================
FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_

# ============================================
# FIREBASE PROJECT ID
# ============================================
FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=accreditation-platform

# ============================================
# API KEYS (Replace with your actual keys)
# ============================================
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-openai-api-key-here

GEMINI_API_KEY=your-gemini-api-key-here

# ============================================
# SERVER PORT
# ============================================
PORT=8000

# ============================================
# OPTIONAL - AI Model Configuration
# ============================================
OPENAI_MODEL_PRIMARY=gpt-5-nano
OPENAI_MODEL_FALLBACK=gpt-5-mini
